meanings.definition: Of or relating to the neurilemma.
meanings.sent1: The neurilemmal sheath protects the nerves.
meanings.sent2: Her neurilemmal cells were carefully studied under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The neurilemmal cover on the wires made them look like tiny soldiers.
meanings.sent4: The neurilemmal barrier shielded the delicate nerves from harm.
meanings.sent5: The neurilemmal layer acted as a guardian for the nerve fibers.

meanings.sent1: The neurilemmal structure of the cell was fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a painting with neurilemmal patterns.
meanings.sent3: The neurilemmal design on the fabric caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: Her neurilemmal costume made her stand out at the party.
meanings.sent5: The neurilemmal texture of the material felt smooth to the touch.
